ref: 1592 ilī f. ʻ a kind of weapon, a cudgel or short sword ʼ, īli -- , īlī -- f. lex.
Pa. illī -- , ˚liyā -- f. ʻ short one -- edged sword ʼ,
Pk. ilī -- f. ʻ a sort of sword ʼ, illa -- m. ʻ sickle, harrow ʼ;
B. ili ʻ cudgel, short sword ʼ;
Or. iḷi ʻ dagger, knife ʼ, irā ʻ scythe ʼ;
M. iḷī f. ʻ a blade set obliquely in a stock for slicing vegetables ʼ, iḷā m. ʻ curved instrument for cutting grass ʼ, iḷat (+ ?) f. ʻ ploughshare scraper ʼ.
